channel.title: Targeting players
channel.description: would it at all be possible to target a certain player or even better....a certain group of players in runescape when doing an action. for example if i wanted the action to be attack could i target a certain user or certain level group.

item.title: Targeting players
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Making it look for specific text like if(level >80 and <126)then. Im not exactly sure how to do it, but im pretty sure it can be done because ive seen a script that looks for levels at the topleft of the screen. You will need to look into it though.

Read full topic

item.title: Targeting players
item.dc:creator: @defd120 defd120
item.description:
@defd120 wrote:

[quote=“Rune Hacker, post:6, topic:83929”]You could either tell it to click below where text is, tell it to click on a group and fidn someone between levels x and x, or just sell it to type in a message and once a trade has been done, it will put in what you want. Idk exactly what the best way to find people are besides getting all the haircolors and adding a tolerance to them.[/quote] how would i do the between lvls x and x thing

Read full topic

item.title: Targeting players
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“defd120, post:4, topic:83929”][quote author=Rune Hacker link=topic=123313.msg1207832#msg1207832 date=1177392093]
What would you use this for btw? If i knew what you would find a person for, that would help more. Like are trying to find who is selling an item, maybe for castlewars, idk, what are you finding someone for.
[/quote]
I was planning on using it for an ess running script for laws[/quote]

Your best bet would be to check map direction and mmouse where they most likely are and check uptext, or find any specific colour in the area they might be.

Read full topic

item.title: Targeting players
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

defd120:

would it at all be possible to target a certain player or even better…a certain group of players in runescape when doing an action. for example if i wanted the action to be attack could i target a certain user or certain level group.

Your question can be answered by simple logic, how do you go about finding a player you’d like to attack in RS anyway? Simple, right click a pile of them, find the level you want, if it’s not there click another pile and ect ect.

You could do this a number of ways, move mouse to key points of the screens where the player(s) might be, get their level(Look in SRL manual), and attack if possible. What I mean is, if your going to varrack level one wildy and your at the gates, go over the ditch, and look to the right + left of the screen.

Read full topic
